title: 347: Astrologically Read to Filth!
itunes:title: 347: Astrologically Read to Filth!
description:
Jessica Lanyadoo is BACK, Broads! Our favorite astrologer/psychic medium/tarot reader, Jessica Lanyadoo, comes on the podcast to astrologically breakdown what 2022 is going to look like - and it’s tough but it’s a powerful listen. Jessica then looks at Bekah and Jess’ birth charts to tell them what this year holds for them and she ABSOLUTELY blows their minds. And she blesses The Broads with some tarot card readings - and more! Send the #broadsquad love to Jessica and make sure to check out her podcast, patreon, and book! 

 

JESSICA LANYADOO: 

*”Ghost of a Podcast”: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/ghost-of-a-podcast-astrology-advice-with-jessica-lanyadoo/id1422483488?mt=2https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/ghost-of-a-podcast-astrology-advice-with-jessica-lanyadoo/id1422483488?mt=2

*Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/JessicaLanyadoo

*Website: http://www.lovelanyadoo.com/

*Book: https://www.penguinrandomhouse.com/books/603459/astrology-for-real-relationships-by-jessica-lanyadoo-with-t-greenaway/

*Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/jessica_lanyadoo/

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***STAMPS.COM: Get a 4-week trial PLUS free postage and a digital scale at STAMPS.COM/CHATTY -  click on the microphone at the top of the homepage and type in CHATTY

***SQUARESPACE: Go to SQUARESPACE.COM/CHATTY for a free trial and use the order code CHATTY to save 10% off your first purchase of a website domain! 

***CALM: Get a special limited-time promotion of 40% off a Calm Premium subscription at CALM.COM/CHATTY

***DIPSEA: Get an extended 30-day free trial when you go to DIPSEASTORIES.COM/CHATTY

***ARTICLE: Go to ARTICLE.COM/CHATTY to get $50 off your first purchase of $100 or more!

***BALLSY: Go to BallWash.com and put in code CHATTYBROADS20 to get 20% OFF!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
